sect1.title: General
sect1.para:
The component DiagnosticTimers is responsible to enable a diagnosis-operation during KL15off for a specified time diagnostic timers are defined and need to be implemented by the component One timer (T_NM_DiagActive) is used to indicate the reason for maintaining diagnostic activity within the DefaultSession and a second timer (T_Diag_Enable) is used to force the suppression of diagnostic communication in the case of no further internal server reasons for maintaining diagnostic activity. The indication about an active diagnosis session is provided to other compoments via the signal NM_DiagActive.
Additionally a timer (KL15TimerForDCY) to check the vehicle-speed is implemented to determine whether or no a driving-cycle is active. DiagnosticTimers has the following main tasks:
cyclically count the timers/counters
determine and provide the status of the diagnosis session via NM_DiagActive
